statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_data;
SELECT institution_id, regulation_code, compliance_status FROM compliance_data ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC;
SELECT institution_id, regulation_code, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT institution_id, regulation_code FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_code LIKE '%123%';
SELECT institution_id FROM compliance_data WHERE last_audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT institution_id, regulation_code FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_code = 'GDPR' ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC;
SELECT institution_id, regulation_code, last_audit_date FROM compliance_data WHERE last_audit_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY institution_id ASC;

SELECT institution_id, regulation_code, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND last_audit_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY compliance_status DESC, last_audit_date ASC;

SELECT AVG(CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(last_audit_date)) AS INTEGER)) AS avg_audit_age_years FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_code LIKE 'PCI%' GROUP BY regulation_code HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_audit_age_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT institution_name, regulation_code FROM compliance_data ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT institution_name, regulation_code FROM compliance_data WHERE institution_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT institution_name, regulation_code, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE institution_name = 'ABC Bank'
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY institution_name DESC
SELECT institution_name, regulation_code, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE institution_name LIKE '%Bank%' AND compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT institution_name, regulation_code FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND regulation_code = '123' ORDER BY institution_name ASC
SELECT institution_name, regulation_code, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_code IN ('456', '789')
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions;
SELECT id, name, country FROM financial_institutions WHERE country='USA';
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT institution_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status=true;
SELECT institution_id, regulation_id, comments FROM compliance_data WHERE institution_id=1;
SELECT id, name, country FROM financial_institutions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE 'GDPR%';
SELECT institution_id, regulation_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = true ORDER BY institution_id DESC;
SELECT id, regulation_name, description FROM regulations ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions;
SELECT id, name, location FROM financial_institutions ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT institution_id, AVG(id) FROM compliance_records GROUP BY institution_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions;
SELECT name, location FROM financial_institutions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE description LIKE '%compliance%';
SELECT compliance_date, status FROM compliance_records ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT institution_id, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_records GROUP BY institution_id;
SELECT * FROM Institutions;
SELECT name, type FROM Institutions WHERE regulations = 'ABC';
SELECT id, name, type FROM Institutions ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE title LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT report_date, status FROM Reports WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Institutions WHERE type = 'Bank' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, regulations FROM Institutions WHERE id = 3;
SELECT r.id, r.report_date, r.status, co.name as compliance_officer FROM Reports r INNER JOIN ComplianceOfficers co ON r.compliance_officer_id = co.id WHERE r.status = 'Pending';
SELECT v.description, r.report_date FROM Violations v INNER JOIN Reports r ON v.report_id = r.id WHERE r.status = 'Open' ORDER BY r.report_date ASC;
SELECT a.audit_date, i.name, a.status FROM Audits a INNER JOIN Institutions i ON a.institution_id = i.id WHERE a.status = 'Completed' ORDER BY a.audit_date DESC;
